trait.name: Reactive
entries: The giant can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes four longsword attacks or two rock attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Deflect Attack
entries: The giant adds 5 to its AC against one weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the giant must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
